April 13, 2016 • Porthcawl, Wales

Now Available for Freelance Work

After a rather unfortunate set of circumstances, which I’ll make sure to write about soon, I’m now available for contract web design and front-end development work.

From now until late May 2016 I want to work on as many projects as possible. So I’ve set up a portfolio and written a little bit about how I can contribute to both the design and development of a web project.
